column5: This 3bd home provides a true Texas country experience while conveniently located in the middle of Austin. It is located just 1 mile from Lake Austin with easy access straight to the heart of the city! The home is set among large oak trees with a huge wrap around porch, rocking chairs, and porch swing. The back yard features a multi-level deck, fire pit for grilling, tree swing, and children's play equipment. Inside you will find distressed wooden floors, wood beam ceilings and Texas decor.
column8: Classic Texas Country Home .48acr Near Lake Austin
